familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Former member/president of Trump Miami Resort Management LLC, in which Pres. Trump retains ownership interests.

Former president/director/chairman of Trump Miami Resort Management Member Corp., in which Pres. Trump retains ownership interests. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.
familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.business: Trump Miami Resort Management Member Corp
